alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Lucas; Madison; Marion; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 04 at 6:15PM CDT until April 04 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LUCAS...SOUTH CENTRAL POLK...SOUTHEASTERN MADISON... SOUTHWESTERN MARION...NORTHERN CLARKE AND WARREN COUNTIES... At 614 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Murray, or 6 miles west of Osceola, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... New Virginia and Truro around 625 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Otter Creek County Park, Lake Ahquabi State Park, Indianola, Milo, Ackworth and Sandyville. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 32 and 60. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Clarke; Lucas; Madison; Marion; Polk; Warren
